attributes.action: Send Mr Hain on a world tour, apologising to everyone he meets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A single trip should save time and taxpayers' money.  There would then be no need for further missions of apology by NuLab to the people of the world for the evils perpetrated on them by the British people.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
